forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 8am and 11am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 80. Southeast wind 3 to 12 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 5am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 86, with temperatures falling to around 84 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms after 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 60. South southwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
